doc.title: Robin Hood

credit.role: Robin Hood as Groucho Marx/Prince John as Humphrey Bogart/Little John as John Wayne/Maid Marion as Carol Channing/Sheriffs of Nottingham as Laurel & Hardy/Alan-a-Dale as George Burns/Various Characters

doc.plot: Rich Little plays all the major characters in the retelling of the Robin Hood story. As in his version of A Christmas Carol, Little plays each character through a classic hollywood personality. Groucho Marx is Robin, Carol Channing is Maid Marion, Humphrey Bogart is Prince John, John Wayne is Little John, and Laurel & Hardy are the Sheriffs of Nottingham.
